Attrition: Whether the employee left the company (Yes/No).
Department: The department the employee belongs to (e.g., Sales, R&D).
DistanceFromHome: Distance (in kilometers) from employee’s home to work.
EducationField: Field in which the employee received their education.
EmployeeNumber: Unique ID number assigned to the employee.
EnvironmentSatisfaction: Employee's satisfaction with the work environment (1–4).
JobInvolvement: Level of involvement in job role (1–4).
JobRole: Specific job title (e.g., Sales Executive, Research Scientist).
MonthlyIncome: Monthly salary paid to the employee.
NumCompaniesWorked: Number of companies the employee has worked for.
OverTime: Whether the employee works overtime regularly (Yes/No).
PercentSalaryHike: Percentage increase in salary from the previous year.
TotalWorkingYears: Total number of years the employee has worked.
TrainingTimesLastYear: Number of training programs attended last year.
YearsAtCompany: Years the employee has worked at the company.
YearsInCurrentRole: Years the employee has been in their current role.
YearsWithCurrManager: Years the employee has worked with their current manager.
BusinessTravel_Travel_Frequently: Employee frequently travels for business purposes.
BusinessTravel_Travel_Rarely: Employee rarely travels for business purposes.
Department_Research & Development: Employee works in the Research & Development department.
Department_Sales: Employee works in the Sales department.
EducationField_Life Sciences: Employee studied a Life Sciences field.
EducationField_Medical: Employee studied in a Medical-related field.
EducationField_Other: Employee studied in a field not listed.
JobRole_Human Resources: Employee works in the Human Resources department.
JobRole_Research Scientist: Employee works as a Research Scientist.
JobRole_Sales Executive: Employee holds a Sales Executive role.
JobRole_Sales Representative: Employee works as a Sales Representative.
